text: @realDonaldTrump Wanting to control what our experts release to the public about the #coronavirus screams authoritarian regime. Why? Because you have gone a day without lying since you were elected. You can’t grasp the simplest details. We don’t trust you because you’re #UnfitToBePresident https://t.co/ZAQ0PBMJMz

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
